front.title: Suggested values for SMTP Enhanced Status Codes for Anti-Spam Policy

abstract.t: This document establishes a set of extended SMTP policy codes foranti-spam. It seeks to provide additional codes for error texts thatcurrently use the extended SMTP error code 5.7.1. The anti-spamcodes were determined by looking at error texts produced by majorISPs and finding commonalities. The result is a new set of errortexts with associated extended SMTP error codes.
